title: Noni Janur and Sam Johnston share a kiss at the beach | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 237 shares Meanwhile, Noni wrapped one arm around her man's neck, while placing the other underneath his exposed thigh. At one stage, Noni was seen lying on her back while Sam playfully stroked her tummy. Confirmed! The couple were both dressed in beach attire, with swimwear designer Noni donning a skimpy blue bikini top and high-waisted black shorts. Staying shady: Noni and Sam shielded their eyes behind trendy round-framed sunglasses Cute display: Noni smiled sweetly, stroking his leg softly in appreciation as Sam beamed down at her Life's a beach! The Bachelor franchise stars looked at ease with each other as they enjoyed their care-free outing Following their loved-up sunbathing session, the pair headed to the sand before taking a refreshing dip in the ocean. As they walked toward the water, Noni and Sam's demeanor became decidedly less amorous, with the pair choosing not to hold hands or walk side-by-side. Following their aquatic adventure, the pair were seen picking up their beach towels and taking a stroll down the beach The pair originally sparked dating rumours back in December last year after they were seen buying groceries together in a Bondi supermarket. While remaining tight-lipped on his romance at the time, Sam did reveal to Daily Mail Australia that he had been 'seeing someone' for several months. 'I've actually been seeing someone,' he said. A recipe for romance? Sam didn't divulge details of the woman's identity, but stated that they began seeing each other shortly after he left The Bachelorette mansion and before the show aired. Daily Mail Australia has reached out to the pair, with Sam not replying and Noni saying she does not wish to make comment at this point Insider: Following the NW claims, a source told Daily Mail Australia that Sam was in fact still seeing his former flame, Bella Daily Mail Australia has reached out to the pair, with Sam not replying and Noni saying she does not wish to make comment at this point. Following the NW claims, a source told Daily Mail Australia that Sam was in fact still seeing his former flame, Bella. 'Sam and Sam's ex are still talking [to each other] and sleeping together,' they revealed. Claims: 'Sam and Sam's ex are still talking [to each other] and sleeping together,' they revealed Romance rumours: 'They started going out at the end of last year and she was the first serious relationship Sam had in a really long time,' said the source 'They started going out at the end of last year and she was the first serious relationship Sam had in a really long time,' 'She was living with him for a couple of months before he went on The Bachelorette,’ the source continued but confirmed Bella knew he was applying for the romance reality TV series. Sam later denied the statement to Daily Mail Australia, saying: 'Bella and I are very good mates still, but are certainly not sleeping together.'
